description: 栎枯萎病的近距离传播有地下、地面两种方式, 地面的传播主要通过小蠹虫和露尾甲等病媒昆虫进行。在遭栎枯萎病为害的寄主树皮下大量地存在。成虫产卵后, 携带栎枯萎病病原孢子的虫体转移到健康树上; 卵孵化后, 幼虫发育为成虫, 携带病原孢子的成虫转移到健康树上; 在病树上越冬的小蠹虫第2年春天同样可携带病原孢子转移到健康树上。随着小蠹虫转移寄主的为害, 病原菌也随之不断地传播, 完成其对寄主的侵染。刚羽化的成虫携带病菌的百分率变化非常大。有些栎枯萎病上发育的小蠹虫带菌率高达30% , 一般为0.4%~ 2.5% 。
reference_name: 传播栎枯萎病的两种鬃额小蠹
author: cpqis.wangnaiyang
named_year: (Bretz) Z.W. de Beer, Marinc., T.A. Duong & M.J. Wingf.

description: Potato mop-top virus is spread by the plasmodiophoromycete fungus Spongospora subterranea (Jones and Harrison, 1969; Arif et al., 1995) and survives for long periods in resting spores (Jones and Harrison, 1972). Factors affecting the germination of resting spores of S. subterranea are unclear but once germinated the resulting zoospores remain motile for 48 hours at 15°C, and although they can probably only swim a few centimetres they are probably carried much further by the movement of water through soil (Harrison et al., 1997). Vector transmission of the virus therefore probably occurs only over short distances within a field.

description: SBMV is vectored by leaf beetles (Chrysomelidae) which most probably transmit the virus in a semi-persistent manner (Walters, 1969; Fulton et al., 1975). The main vectors are Ceratoma trifurcata and Epilachna varivestis in North America (Walters 1969; Fulton et al., 1975) and Ootheca mutabilis in West Africa (Allen et al., 1981). Madurasia obscurella has been reported as a vector in India (Reddy and Varma, 1986).
author: cpqis.wangxiufen

description: Levitzky et al. (2019) showed that ToBRFV could be carried by bumblebees (Bombus terrestris) and mechanically transmitted to healthy tomato plants during pollination and consequently could contribute to disease spread in tomato in glasshouses. Bumblebees are commonly used in pollinating tomatoes and could be an important mode of spread. On the other hand, transmission of ToBRFV by specific vectors has not been reported.

description: The pine wood nematode, Bursaphelenchus xylophilus, is widespread and abundant on native pine forests of North America, particularly in the eastern USA. It is ubiquitous in a wide range of climates, from subtropical to sub-boreal, but is not considered as a serious pest on this continent, except for on exotic or damaged pines. When introduced into Eurasia, some local Pinus proved to be exceptionally susceptible, and the pine wood nematode became the major invasive pine pathogen in Europe and East Asia. The pine wood nematode uses pine sawyer beetles of the genus Monochamus as vectors to exit depleted hosts and infect new ones, readily adapting to local Monochamus spp., both in North America and in areas where it is invasive.
光亮尖头叶蝉Xyphon fulgidum是木质部难养菌Xylella fastidiosa的传播媒介昆虫。木质部难养菌是葡萄皮尔斯病（Pierce’s disease）和苜蓿矮缩病（alfalfa dwarf）以及杏仁叶焦病（almond leaf scorch）的病原菌。

description:
Plant parts liable to carry the pest in trade/transport: 植物某些部位能运输有害物质。 Bulbs/tubers/corms/rhizomes: Eggs, juveniles, adults; borne internally; borne externally; visible under light microscope.鳞茎，块茎，球茎，根茎：卵，幼体，成体。内部，外部，在光学显微镜下都能看的见。
 - Growing medium accompanying plants: Eggs, juveniles, adults; borne externally; visible under light microscope.处于正在成长期的植物：
 - Flowers/inflorescences/cones/calyx: Eggs, juveniles, adults; borne internally; borne externally; visible under light microscope.花，花序，圆锥细胞，花萼：
 - Leaves: Eggs, juveniles, adults; borne internally; borne externally; visible under light microscope.树叶：
 - Seedlings/micropropagated plants: Eggs, juveniles, adults; borne internally; borne externally; visible under light microscope.树苗：
 - Stems (above ground)/shoots/trunks/branches: Eggs, juveniles, adults; borne internally; borne externally; visible under light microscope.茎干，中继线，树枝：
 - True seeds (inc. grain): Eggs, juveniles, adults; borne externally; visible under light microscope.真正的种子：

Plant parts not known to carry the pest in trade/transport:植物有些部位不能运输有害物质。
 - Bark树皮：
 - Fruits (inc. pods)果实；
 - Roots根：
 - Wood.

Transport pathways for long distance movement:长距离运输的方式：
 - Conveyances (transport vehicles)运输工具
 - Mail: With ornamentals邮件方式：观赏植物
 - Containers and packing集装箱：
 - Soil, gravel, water, etc.土壤，沙砾，水  等等
 - Travellers and baggage: With ornamentals旅行者：观赏植物

description: transmitted by the nematode Xiphinema americanum in the field
reference_name: Seed and pollen transmission of Apple latent spherical virus in apple
author: cpqis.liangxinmiao

description: 线虫在24小时内可以获毒，成虫和幼虫都可以传播。线虫的传播效率很高，可传播至多种植物。
reference_name: 中国进境植物检疫性有害生物——病毒卷
author: cpqis.wangnaiyang

description: Xiphinema americanum是传毒的优势种群。生活周期至少为一年，线虫能在没有寄主植物的土壤中发育成熟，但是不能繁殖。线虫繁殖最适宜温度为2℃-24℃，高温和低湿条件下种群数量减少，在冰冻土壤中存活期短。
reference_name: 中国进境植物检疫性有害生物——病毒卷

description: 通过幼虫、蛹和成虫在果实内危害取食传播，隐蔽性强。
author: 徐淼锋

description: Cucurbit aphid-borne yellows virus (CABYV) is a phloem-limited virus that is transmitted in a persistent, non-propagative mode by aphids, including Aphis gossypii and Myzus persicae.
reference_name: First report of Cucurbit aphid-borne yellows virus in Vicia faba
